text: 2013 FIFA Confederations Cup was the 9th FIFA Confederations Cup tournament. It took place in Brazil from 15 to 30 June. The host, Brazil won the tournament after defeating Spain. Italy got third place. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 9 2 +7 9 3 2 0 1 8 8 0 6 3 1 0 2 3 5 -2 3 3 0 0 3 4 9 -5 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 15 1 +14 9 3 2 0 1 11 3 +8 6 3 1 0 2 7 6 +1 3 3 0 0 3 1 24 -23 0 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round4-with third |26 June – Belo Horizonte||2||1 |27 June – Fortaleza||0 (7)||0 (6) |30 June – Rio de Janeiro||3||0 |30 June – Salvador||2 (2)||2 (3) }} ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:FIFA Confederations Cup tournaments Category:2013 in association football Category:2010s in Brazil Category:Football in Brazil Category:June 2013 events Category:2013 in South America
